issue.title: gzclient crashes with assertion failed when using XFCE after restoring minimized window

content.raw: Please mind that the second error (`gzclient: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:653: typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::rendering::Camera; typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type = gazebo::rendering::Camera*]: Assertion `px != 0' failed.`) also happens in the normal Ubuntu window manager.
